titles: The loyall subjects lamentation for Londons perversenesse, in the malignant choice of some rotten members, on Tuesday the 19. of March 1661.
author: Rise, Augustin, attributed name.
notes: Verse - "Oh horrid monsters! what strange newes is here,".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 28"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been altered in MS to "0".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Humor --  Early works to 1800.
London (England) --  Politics and government --  17th century --  Humor --  Early works to 1800.
